version_description:
Decred (DCR) and Exchange Order syncing have been enabled—moving us closer toward a seamless Exodus experience across multiple devices.

Decred (DCR), one of our most popular Desktop assets has made the jump to Mobile. Securely manage and exchange DCR from the comfort of your iOS device.

Keeping track of exchanges just got clearer for those running the same wallet on Mobile and Desktop. Exchanges made on your home computer will automatically display in your Mobile wallet Exchange History. Exchanges made on your phone will automatically reflect in your Desktop wallet.

That's all for this week, but we'll be back in another two weeks with fresh new updates!

If you're enjoying Exodus, consider rating the app and leaving us a review. :)

DAI & SNT found a home in your newly redecorated Mobile wallet.

DAI is a dollar-pegged stablecoin stabilized by MakerDAO’s smart contract. Swiftly exchange DAI with over 40 other assets.

Status Network Token comes aboard! The Status project aims to build a messaging platform and mobile interface for other Ethereum applications.

Meanwhile, a newly designed send screen, combined with slick exchange animations, will make you the envy of all crypto hodlers who glance at your phone. Seize the moment!

NEO, NEO’s GAS, Lisk, and Waves stride with confidence as new exchangeable assets into your wallet. You can now hold NEO and easily claim your GAS with a tap.

Exodus has the need for speed, and loads faster than ever. The startup time of your mobile wallet has been cut in half.

Meanwhile, Exodus’ relentless thirst for design continues: New animations, updated price trend lines, and other improvements have hitched a ride.

NANO, a fast and feeless cryptocurrency for your on-the-go lifestyle, has hit your mobile wallet. Securely send, receive, and exchange your NANO from the comfort of your phone. Its ledger uses a lattice-like structure in place of the traditional chain of blocks, so you'll never be left waiting for a block to arrive. Touch and go!

Meanwhile, you may experience some visual fun in your next exchange as new animations spice things up.

NANO, a fast and feeless cryptocurrency for your on-the-go lifestyle, has hit your mobile wallet. Securely send, receive, and exchange your NANO from the comfort of your phone. Its ledger uses a lattice-like structure in place of the traditional chain of blocks, so you'll never be left waiting for a block to arrive. Touch and go!

Meanwhile, you may experience some visual fun in your next exchange as new animations spice things up.

Cosmos (ATOM), an ecosystem of interconnected blockchains, has spun its way onto your mobile phone.

Your wallet, like the price of Bitcoin, is always on the move; new animations throughout the app keep the pace when swapping between your favorite assets or sending funds.

And with such an active lifestyle, improved performance is expected. An improved startup time for your wallet means more time to gaze into the cosmos while dreaming of moons!

Enjoy the latest update and see you in two weeks!

Much wow! Dogecoin (DOGE), Ontology & Ontology Gas (ONT/ONG), and Ripio Credit Network (RCN) have found a home in your Mobile wallet. With the addition of these three, Exodus now supports 50+ assets. Such inspire! Very coin.

Earn passive ONG for simply holding ONT in your wallet. Your Ontology wallet makes it easy to instantly claim generated ONG with a tap.

Interactive charts make viewing historical pricing a breeze. Move your finger across the pricing charts to see past prices by time or date.

Much wow! Dogecoin (DOGE), Ontology & Ontology Gas (ONT/ONG), and Ripio Credit Network (RCN) have found a home in your Mobile wallet. With the addition of these three, Exodus now supports 50+ assets. Such inspire! Very coin.

Earn passive ONG for simply holding ONT in your wallet. Your Ontology wallet makes it easy to instantly claim generated ONG with a tap.

Interactive charts make viewing historical pricing a breeze. Move your finger across the pricing charts to see past prices by time or date.

NEM and ARK, Desktop pairing with Mobile, sweep BTC private keys—this release is jam-packed with goodies!

NEM (XEM) and Ark (ARK) join over 50+ exchangeable assets.

With so many new assets, we had to add search functionality! Go to Profile and type an asset name to quickly add it to your wallet.

Easily pair with Desktop by scanning a QR code for access to your funds on the go.

Sweep funds from a BTC paper wallet into your Mobile wallet by scanning its QR code or manually entering a private key.

Exodus design takes center stage as we add an option for personal notes and a flurry of slick animations.

Personal notes now make it easy to keep track of your transactions within Exodus. Breathe, and simplify your accounting.

As if soothing colors and dreamy sound effects weren’t enough of a dopamine hit, you can now experience visuals as unique animations bring your wallet to life while exchanging.

Exodus design takes center stage as we add an option for personal notes and a flurry of slick animations.

Personal notes now make it easy to keep track of your transactions within Exodus. Breathe, and simplify your accounting.

As if soothing colors and dreamy sound effects weren’t enough of a dopamine hit, you can now experience visuals as unique animations bring your wallet to life while exchanging.

Exodus design takes center stage as we add an option for personal notes and a flurry of slick animations.

Personal notes now make it easy to keep track of your transactions within Exodus. Breathe, and simplify your accounting.

As if soothing colors and dreamy sound effects weren’t enough of a dopamine hit, you can now experience visuals as unique animations bring your wallet to life while exchanging.

Monero (XMR), one of the hottest and most requested assets makes its mobile debut! Finally, the design of Exodus meets the privacy of Monero. Securely send, receive, and exchange XMR without ever giving up control of your funds or privacy.

Design updates slide into Exodus ready for a bullish 2020. Happy New Year!

New icons in your wallet’s activity section help you immediately distinguish between different types of transactions. That means less time trying to figure out whether a transaction was your crypto dividends deposit or an exchange.

Slight design changes to the settings and security screens make it easier to navigate and find what you’re looking for.

New animations are live while exchanging. We’re wearing our best!

Your Monero (XMR) wallet now allows you to set a custom node for maximum privacy. For those running Monero on Exodus Desktop, you can easily sync both Mobile and Desktop wallets with a simple QR code scan. Ease of use and privacy - two of our favorite terms at Exodus :)

Your Monero (XMR) wallet now allows you to set a custom node for maximum privacy. For those running Monero on Exodus Desktop, you can easily sync both Mobile and Desktop wallets with a simple QR code scan. Ease of use and privacy - two of our favorite terms at Exodus :)

The wait is over! Cardano (ADA), one of our most requested assets, has joined the Exodus family. Easily secure, manage, and exchange ADA from the comfort of your mobile wallet.

Lo and behold, NANO holders can now set a custom representative in the NANO wallet Advanced Drawer.

New animations glide into the exchange feature. Experience delightful sights as you swap assets.

BitPay and animated market charts. Read on for the features that made it into our latest release.

Extended BitPay functionality now lets you pay BitPay invoices from Exodus with Ethereum, in addition to Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash.

You may notice some extra movement in your wallet’s market charts. Tap and hold down on a chart for a zoomed-in view.

Hey-o! We’re back with VeChain (VET) & VeThor (VTHO) tokens at our side. Send and receive both assets, and exchange VET with ease.

While you’re checking out the new coins and animated charts (you saw those, right?), pop into your Bitcoin wallet advanced menu to enable `Multiple Bitcoin Addresses` for greater privacy while transacting.

For EOS hodlers, greater control has been bestowed as you can now effortlessly stake and unstake your EOS from the palm of your hand.

While you’re checking out the new coins and animated charts (you saw those, right?), pop into your Bitcoin wallet advanced menu to enable `Multiple Bitcoin Addresses` for greater privacy while transacting.

For EOS hodlers, greater control has been bestowed as you can now effortlessly stake and unstake your EOS from the palm of your hand.

This release tightens some nuts and bolts so that your wallet remains at peak performance.

Your Nano wallet got a tune-up and sending NANO is now faster than ever. A little maintenance work on the EOS wallet has reinforced the stability of the latest staking and unstaking feature. We also did some light under-the-hood polishing in preparation for soon to arrive features. Stay tuned ;)

This release tightens some nuts and bolts so that your wallet remains at peak performance.

Your Nano wallet got a tune-up and sending NANO is now faster than ever. A little maintenance work on the EOS wallet has reinforced the stability of the latest staking and unstaking feature. We also did some light under-the-hood polishing in preparation for soon to arrive features. Stay tuned ;)

Winter has come to a close and Exodus has kicked into Spring cleaning mode. While this release doesn't include shiny new coins and fancy features, it does come with backend updates to guarantee a smoother Exodus experience. General maintenance ensures everything under the hood is optimized for peak performance and keeps your wallet beautiful inside and out.

Winter has come to a close and Exodus has kicked into Spring cleaning mode. While this release doesn't include shiny new coins and fancy features, it does come with backend updates to guarantee a smoother Exodus experience. General maintenance ensures everything under the hood is optimized for peak performance and keeps your wallet beautiful inside and out.

Winter has come to a close and Exodus has kicked into Spring cleaning mode. While this release doesn't include shiny new coins and fancy features, it does come with backend updates to guarantee a smoother Exodus experience. General maintenance ensures everything under the hood is optimized for peak performance and keeps your wallet beautiful inside and out.

ICON (ICX) and new chart animations glide into your wallet.

ICON becomes our 60th supported asset! Securely send, receive, and exchange ICX with over 50 other assets.

Get a closer look at your portfolio’s past performance. Tap and hold down on any chart for a zoomed-in view.

ICON (ICX) and new chart animations glide into your wallet.

ICON becomes our 60th supported asset! Securely send, receive, and exchange ICX with over 50 other assets.

Get a closer look at your portfolio’s past performance. Tap and hold down on any chart for a zoomed-in view.

New icons have been introduced to highlight your wallet activity.

Your EOS transaction history has new icons to help distinguish staking actions from other types of transactions.

You may notice a green dot in the upper right-hand corner in some areas of your wallet. The green dot helps highlight in-progress items. If you have exchanges in progress, you’ll see a green dot over the exchange history icon. If your XMR wallet is syncing, you'll notice a green dot in your XMR wallet.

Boom! 100 cryptocurrencies are on the scene. Augur, Kyber, Power Ledger... we will run out of space if we list them all here. Open your wallet and take a peek at the new assets who have made your mobile phone their new home.

While most assets in Exodus are available for fast and easy exchanges, some are only available for secure storage. For those who have their desktop wallet synced with mobile, your balances will automatically update.

This update adds asset descriptions and welcomes a smoother startup with enhanced exchange performance. Open an asset’s wallet and tap “About” for a synopsis about the project behind a specific coin. We refined some background processes so that the app is more efficient when loading the portfolio and exchange screens. The result is smoother transitions and improved loading times. Stay cool.

Tezos (XTZ) staking and UMA token (UMA) have arrived.

Staking allows you to earn XTZ like a savings account. Easily stake your XTZ in a tap to earn more XTZ. Staking rewards will be automatically deposited into your Tezos wallet.

UMA token joins Exodus as our 101st asset addition. Securely store and send UMA to your heart's content.

Algorand (ALGO) makes its Exodus debut with built-in staking. Send, receive, stake, and exchange ALGO with ease. And the best part? Earn rewards just for holding ALGO. Staking rewards are instantly claimable with the tap of a button.

Algorand (ALGO) makes its Exodus debut with built-in staking. Send, receive, stake, and exchange ALGO with ease. And the best part? Earn rewards just for holding ALGO. Staking rewards are instantly claimable with the tap of a button.

Compound (COMP), StormX (STMX), Revain (REV), and Dentacoin (DCN) slide into your wallet. Securely store, send and receive all four tokens with ease.

Keep track of your outgoing transaction details by adding personal notes from the send screen. Your notes are private and only viewable in-wallet. Breathe, and simplify your accounting.

For our power users, you'll receive an in-app notification if your device is running low on storage.

Compound (COMP), StormX (STMX), Revain (REV), and Dentacoin (DCN) slide into your wallet. Securely store, send and receive all four tokens with ease.

Keep track of your outgoing transaction details by adding personal notes from the send screen. Your notes are private and only viewable in-wallet. Breathe, and simplify your accounting.

For our power users, you'll receive an in-app notification if your device is running low on storage.

Earn rewards with Cosmos ATOM staking. Staking your crypto assets allows you to earn interest on your holdings, just like a savings account. Easily stake your ATOM with a tap to earn more ATOM.

We finetuned Exodus on the backend to boost performance. Even with over 100 supported assets and new staking features, your wallet is as sleek as ever. Enjoy the ride toward financial sovereignty.

Earn rewards with Cosmos ATOM staking. Staking your crypto assets allows you to earn interest on your holdings, just like a savings account. Easily stake your ATOM with a tap to earn more ATOM.

We finetuned Exodus on the backend to boost performance. Even with over 100 supported assets and new staking features, your wallet is as sleek as ever. Enjoy the ride toward financial sovereignty.

APY rates for interest-bearing assets, a more accessible exchange feature, and the iPad gets a little love... read on!

You may notice more color in your portfolio if you have interest-bearing assets like Tezos, Cosmos, Algorand, and other staking coins enabled. The APY rate will display next to assets that are eligible to earn rewards. Enter the asset wallet and click the badge in the top right corner to earn rewards.

We’ve added an exchange button directly in each of the asset wallets. Why? Well, because every tap saved is one tap closer to your crypto kingdom dreams. Quickly exchange 70+ assets in a few taps.

Our beloved iPad users wrote in asking for Exodus in landscape mode. Consider this our reply letter: We got you. Flip your iPad horizontally first, then open Exodus, and thank you for your feedback.

APY rates for interest-bearing assets, a more accessible exchange feature, and the iPad gets a little love... read on!

You may notice more color in your portfolio if you have interest-bearing assets like Tezos, Cosmos, Algorand, and other staking coins enabled. The APY rate will display next to assets that are eligible to earn rewards. Enter the asset wallet and click the badge in the top right corner to earn rewards.

We’ve added an exchange button directly in each of the asset wallets. Why? Well, because every tap saved is one tap closer to your crypto kingdom dreams. Quickly exchange 70+ assets in a few taps.

Our beloved iPad users wrote in asking for Exodus in landscape mode. Consider this our reply letter: We got you. Flip your iPad horizontally first, then open Exodus, and thank you for your feedback.

Nothing too fancy to speak of this release but with 100+ assets, a fast 24/7 exchange, high-interest staking features, and real-time price charts, dedicated and consistent maintenance is vital to keeping Exodus running as silky as a Tesla Roadster.

For Augur (REP) holders, it’s one-button easy to swap your tokens to the new upgraded version directly from your Augur wallet.

Cardano (ADA) fans, your wallet has been successfully updated to meet the recent Shelley upgrade requirements.

Dear avid release notes reader,

Every two weeks, a new app update faithfully graces its way in to make today’s Exodus better than yesterday’s. This week, general maintenance and some bug squashes take center stage. We know they don’t have the same star power as new assets or cool features, but we’re still in the opening act of this Exodus story. Stay tuned.

A new batch of Ethereum powered tokens is fresh out the oven: adToken ADT, Matchpool GUP, MediShares MDS, QASH, Rivetz RVT, TaaS, WeTrust TRST & Veritaseum VERI.

While the new tokens are not yet exchangeable, they can be securely stored, sent, and received from the palm of your hand. Oh, and each of their wallets can be synced with the Exodus desktop app. Enjoy!

Uniswap (UNI), Zilliqa (ZIL), and Flare’s Spark token airdrop. Ready for the deets? Read on!

This release adds support for Zilliqa’s ZIL utility token and Uniswap’s UNI governance token. Securely manage and exchange UNI and ZIL.

Oh, and if you’re thinking about syncing your mobile wallet to Exodus desktop, go right ahead. Both assets, along with 100 others, are supported there as well.

You can now register for Flare’s Spark token airdrop using your XRP address. One-click and you’re set.

Bitcoin custom fees are live! Exodus will calculate the recommended fee so that your BTC gets where it needs to be — fast. Or, set your own fee using the stylish Bitcoin fee slider. Enable the freedom by tapping the gear icon in your BTC wallet and toggling on Custom Fees.

Worried about setting a low fee and waiting forever for a transaction to complete? We got ya covered. We’ve introduced a one-tap feature to speed things up if Exodus detects any slowpokes.

Bitcoin custom fees are live! Exodus will calculate the recommended fee so that your BTC gets where it needs to be — fast. Or, set your own fee using the stylish Bitcoin fee slider. Enable the freedom by tapping the gear icon in your BTC wallet and toggling on Custom Fees.

Worried about setting a low fee and waiting forever for a transaction to complete? We got ya covered. We’ve introduced a one-tap feature to speed things up if Exodus detects any slowpokes.

HBAR, YFI, SNX, WBTC, BAL, CRO, REN, ONT—do we have your attention? We’d hate for you to miss out on the fun of new coins!


Hedera Hashgraph (HBAR) lands in Exodus along with the reward earning power of Ontology (ONT) staking.


But we didn’t stop there... DeFi tokens have joined the exodus toward a freer financial future. Yearn Finance (YFI), Synthetix (SNX), Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC), Balancer (BAL), Crypto.com Coin (CRO), and Ren (REN) are all available for secure storage and swift exchanges.

HBAR, YFI, SNX, WBTC, BAL, CRO, REN, ONT—do we have your attention? We’d hate for you to miss out on the fun of new coins!

Hedera Hashgraph (HBAR) lands in Exodus along with the reward earning power of Ontology (ONT) staking.

But we didn’t stop there... DeFi tokens have joined the exodus toward a freer financial future. Yearn Finance (YFI), Synthetix (SNX), Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC), Balancer (BAL), Crypto.com Coin (CRO), and Ren (REN) are all available for secure storage and swift exchanges.

Brace yourselves — Cardano (ADA) staking, Curve DAO (CRV), and Aragon (ANT) version 2 have hit your mobile phone.

Cardano staking is live! Stake your ADA tokens and earn interest with the tap of a button.

Curve DAO (CRV) has joined a growing list of DeFi tokens. Send, receive, and exchange CRV from the palm of your hand.

Aragon (ANT) version 2 is active. If you’re holding old ANT tokens, you’ll be able to easily swap to the new tokens.

We all love to read about cool new features or assets, and after weeks of doing just that, Exodus needed some love to keep up with all the changes. We turbo-boosted your Exodus wallet with behind the scenes improvements. Consider this a strong yet humble breather while we prepare for lift-off. There is a lot more coming.

We all love to read about cool new features or assets, and after weeks of doing just that, Exodus needed some love to keep up with all the changes. We turbo-boosted your Exodus wallet with behind the scenes improvements. Consider this a strong yet humble breather while we prepare for lift-off. There is a lot more coming.

Say hello to some new beautifully helpful animations - Keeping track of your exchanges and wallet restore progress has never been easier. Go on a tapping spree to see if you can find the rest!

By the way, tapping on an asset will now have that little bit extra for you. Switch to the new Balance mode to see your crypto value over time, or check out the new Videos tab for some helpful pointers.

Say hello to some new beautifully helpful animations - Keeping track of your exchanges and wallet restore progress has never been easier. Go on a tapping spree to see if you can find the rest!

By the way, tapping on an asset will now have that little bit extra for you. Switch to the new Balance mode to see your crypto value over time, or check out the new Videos tab for some helpful pointers.

Solana SOL, video and blog content, and added privacy for Monero transactions. Here is how Exodus is getting ready for a fabulous new year.

Please give a warm welcome to Solana! Securely manage and exchange SOL within the comfort of your phone.

Feel like reading or watching a show? Open up your Bitcoin wallet and tap the video or blog tab. Each wallet now hosts original crypto content. Exodus and chill.

Open up your Monero XMR advanced menu to enable `Multiple Addresses` to increase privacy.

Solana SOL, video and blog content, and added privacy for Monero transactions. Here is how Exodus is getting ready for a fabulous new year.

Please give a warm welcome to Solana! Securely manage and exchange SOL within the comfort of your phone.

Feel like reading or watching a show? Open up your Bitcoin wallet and tap the video or blog tab. Each wallet now hosts original crypto content. Exodus and chill.

Open up your Monero XMR advanced menu to enable `Multiple Addresses` to increase privacy.
